tool_description: An API showing all the lasted Economy News around the world.
name: Economy Dashboard Live
title: Economy Dashboard Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Economy Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Economy from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://economy-dashboard-live.p.rapidapi.com/economy/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "economy-dashboard-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://economy-dashboard-live.p.rapidapi.com/economy/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "economy-dashboard-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Economy Lasted News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Economy from all over the world.
